outputs: [Dream Decay] Decayed 5 dreams, recycled 2 latent symbols.
[Goal Selection] Selected 2 top-priority goals for next cycle.
[Ego Mediation] Balanced 5 competing drives, adjusted priorities to optimize coherence.
[Superego Check] Validated proposed actions; blocked 2 due to ethical/cultural constraint.
[Memory Encoding] Stored 3 new episodic memories, 2 semantic associations.
[Metacognitive Analysis] Identified 2 recurring patterns in recent cognition; raised self-reflection marker.
[Thought Emergence] Generated 5 new high-confidence cognitive threads.
[Learning Reinforcement] Rewarded 3 behaviors, updated synaptic weight matrix, performed incremental transfer.
[Attention Stabilization] Maintained working memory within optimal focus range.
[Affect Encoding] Logged affective trace: positive valence, moderate arousal.
[Emotion Regulation] Adjusted emotional modulation parameters for upcoming cycle.
[External Stimuli Sync] Synchronized 2 external sensor events.
[Integrity Audit] No anomalies detected, all modules verified.
warnings: Working memory approaching focus saturation: auto-stabilizers engaged.
Superego: Pattern of recurring rule conflict detected, recommend scenario review.
Minor valence inversion during emotion regulation. Nominal impact.
Dream decay rate exceeding average: monitor for cognitive drift.
verifications: All critical and non-critical modules: integrity check PASSED.
No data corruption or memory leaks detected.
Static code, runtime, and security checks: 100% PASS.
Schema and linter compliance quadruple-validated (PEP8, Black, Flake8, Pyright, mypy).

glossary.definition: Symbolic Memory Organization Gridâ€”a subsystem for ambient symbolic/dream processing.
Process of phasing out obsolete or low-relevance dream fragments to recycle symbolic resources.
Algorithmic reduction and synthesis of multiple dream symbols into compact, high-level representations.
Dynamic balancing by Ego between subconscious drives, superego constraints, and current operational priorities.
Validation layer enforcing agentic action conformance to ethical, cultural, social, and contextual rules.
Systematic self-assessment of ongoing thoughts and processes to identify patterns, optimize self-reflection, and adjust strategies.
Capturing and encoding emotional valence and arousal into cognitive and memory traces for richer behavioral context.
Monitoring and controlled adjustment of affective/emotional state parameters for optimal cognitive and behavioral modulation.
Process of maintaining operational focus and working memory within optimal ranges, suppressing distractions or overload.
Automated inspection and validation process confirming data, logic, and security integrity of all subsystems.
